  <script type="text/javascript">
   var googletag = googletag || {};
  googletag.cmd = googletag.cmd || [];

  function oxDone() {
    var gads = document.createElement("script");
    gads.async = true;
    gads.type = "text/javascript";
    var useSSL = "https:" == document.location.protocol;
    gads.src = (useSSL ? "https:" : "http:") + "//www.googletagservices.com/tag/js/gpt.js";
    var node = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
    node.parentNode.insertBefore(gads, node);
  }

  setTimeout(function() { if (!('OX' in window)) {oxDone()}},5000);
  </script>
  <!-- Build Key/Value Object + Set adUnit Name -->
  <!-- do the fucking changes work or what? -->
  <script>
   // DFP Setup
    var bcom = bcom || {};
    bcom.dfp = bcom.dfp || {};
    bcom.dfp.networkCode = 61381659;
    bcom.dfp.adUnit = 'boston.com/sports/colleges';
    bcom.dfp.adSlots = ['ad_toprightslot','ad_outofpage3','ad_outofpage2','ad_outofpage1','ad_stream6','ad_stream5','ad_stream4','ad_stream3','ad_stream2','ad_stream1','ad_featurestack1','ad_lead1'];
    bcom.dfp.streamCount = '5';
    bcom.dfp.galleryCount = '';
    bcom.dfp.refreshRate = '';
    bcom.dfp.keyValuePairs = {
        
        s1: 'boston.com',
        s2: 'sports',
        s3: 'colleges',
        s4: '',
        s5: '',
        pgtype : 'article',
        pageurl : '_sports_colleges_2015_03_20_hockey-east-semifinals-can-umass-lowell-get-third-straight-title-game_FcWBvtPnxo9b1A6lTadSZP_story_html',

        pos: ''
    };
  </script>

      !function(win,undefined){"use strict";function addEventListener(el,eventName,handler){el.addEventListener?el.addEventListener(eventName,handler):el.attachEvent("on"+eventName,function(){handler.call(el)})}function toggleClass(el,className){if(el.classList)el.classList.toggle(className);else{for(var classes=el.className.split(" "),existingIndex=-1,i=classes.length;i--;)classes[i]===className&amp;&amp;(existingIndex=i);existingIndex&gt;=0?classes.splice(existingIndex,1):classes.push(className),el.className=classes.join(" ")}}var clickTarget=document.getElementById("bdc-drop-hat-button"),dropDown=document.getElementById("bdc-hat-list");addEventListener(clickTarget,"click",function(){toggleClass(dropDown,"bdc-hat__list--active"),toggleClass(clickTarget,"bdc-hat__logo-button--active")})}(window);
     </script>

    <!-- Main Content Well -->
    <div class="content-well content-well--main content-well--article" role="main">
     <!-- Content Header -->
     <header class="content-header">
      <h1 class="content-header__headline">
       Hockey East Championship: Can UMass Lowell Capture Third Straight Title?

        <li class="content-social-bar__item" data-canonical="http://www.boston.com/sports/colleges/2015/03/20/hockey-east-semifinals-can-umass-lowell-get-third-straight-title-game/FcWBvtPnxo9b1A6lTadSZP/story.html" data-headline="Hockey East Championship: Can UMass Lowell Capture Third Straight Title?" data-thumb-type="image" data-thumbnail="http://p.o0bc.com/rf/image_700w/Boston/2011-2020/2014/03/26/Boston.com/Sports/Images/1dfe86b7dfec4dbea19991fa8429c038-1dfe86b7dfec4dbea19991fa8429c038-0.jpg">

           </span>

           </span>

         </li>
         <li class="content-social-bar__item">
          <a class="content-social-bar__button email-button js-share-modal" data-canonical="http://www.boston.com/sports/colleges/2015/03/20/hockey-east-semifinals-can-umass-lowell-get-third-straight-title-game/FcWBvtPnxo9b1A6lTadSZP/story.html" data-headline="Hockey East Championship: Can UMass Lowell Capture Third Straight Title?" data-omniture="Email | sticky | " data-provider="email" data-thumb-type="image" data-thumbnail="http://p.o0bc.com/rf/image_700w/Boston/2011-2020/2014/03/26/Boston.com/Sports/Images/1dfe86b7dfec4dbea19991fa8429c038-1dfe86b7dfec4dbea19991fa8429c038-0.jpg" href="#share-modal">

           </span>

            Email
           </span>
          </a>
         </li>
        </ul>
       </div>
       <!-- / .content-social--bar -->
       <div class="content-well--wrapper">
        <!-- Content Byline -->
        <!-- storyPubDate = 20150321154819 // lastPubDate -->
        <div class="content-byline">
         <div class="content-byline__producer">
          By Jeff Pini
         </div>
         <div class="content-byline__details">
          Boston.com Staff | 03.21.15 | 11:48 AM
         </div>
        </div>
        <!-- / content-byline -->
        <!-- Content Text -->
        <div class="content-text">
         <div id="adg_main">
         </div>
         <p class="content-text__text">
          With the Hockey East Tournament semifinals in the books, the stage has been set for the 2015 championship game on Saturday, pitting the Boston University Terriers against the UMass Lowell Rivers Hawks.
         </p>
         <p class="content-text__text">
          The 2015 title game, scheduled for 7 p.m. at the TD Garden, is a
          <a href="http://www.hockeyeastonline.com/men/boxes13.php?mbu_uml1.m23" target="_blank">
           rematch of the 2013 championship
          </a>
          , when UMass Lowell took down BU 1-0. The game will mark the 17th time the Terriers have made the finals, while the River Hawks are playing in their fifth championship game. A win for BU would secure their eighth tournament championship, while UMass Lowells third straight title would also be their third overall.
         </p>
         <p class="content-text__text">
          It was a two-game sweep for BU in their two regular season meetings with UMass Lowell, as the Terriers beat the River Hawks
          <a href="http://www.hockeyeastonline.com/men/boxes15.php?mbu_uml1.j18" target="_blank">
           4-3 in Boston
          </a>
          before later notching a
          <a href="http://www.hockeyeastonline.com/men/boxes15.php?mbu_uml1.f06" target="_blank">
           5-2 win in Lowell
          </a>
          .
         </p>
         <!-- adlayer topright: /Boston/Production/BDC/WebPages/homepage.ad-layer.story-asset.dwp -->
         <div class="ad-container ad-container--content-ad ad-container--ad_toprightslot" data-ad-shifted="false" data-position-two="content-well--sidebar" data-position-two-index="1">
          <div class="ad-container__notification">
           Advertisement - Continue Reading Below
          </div>
          <!--Positions: dwc_dfp_position -->
          <div class="ad-toprightslot" id="ad_toprightslot">
          </div>
         </div>
         <p class="content-text__text">
          In the first semifinal game on Friday, two-time defending tournament champions and No. 4 seed UMass Lowell
          <a href="http://www.hockeyeastonline.com/men/boxes15.php?mumlver1.m20" target="_blank">
           clinched a trip to their third consecutive championship game
          </a>
          after taking down No. 7 Vermont. After the Catamounts took a 1-0 lead 11:42 into the game, the River Hawks responded with a 5-on-3 goal less than a minute later. Still 1-1 into the waning minutes of the second period, UMass Lowell grabbed the lead for good with 3:50 to play in the frame. The River Hawks would add two more in the third period, including an empty-netter in the final minute to seal the victory.
         </p>
         <p class="content-text__text">
          Making their first trip to the semifinals since 2010, Vermont couldnt get past the two-time defending champs and reach their first title game since 2008. The Catamounts have yet to win their first tournament championship.
         </p>
         <p class="content-text__text">
          It was
          <a href="http://www.hockeyeastonline.com/men/boxes15.php?mbu_unh1.m20" target="_blank">
           dj vu all over again in the later game
          </a>
          , with regular season champion and No. 1 seed BU falling behind 1-0 to No. 8 New Hampshire before knotting it up. BU scored two unanswered goals to take a 2-1 lead into the third. Freshman sensation and
          <a href="http://www.boston.com/sports/colleges/2015/03/19/jack-eichel-named-hobey-baker-award-finalist/JM5DDC8kgRvIvsoJbzznZL/story.html" target="_blank">
           Hobey Baker finalist
          </a>
          Jack Eichel punched the Terriers ticket to the title game with a pair of goals in the final period.
         </p>
         <p class="content-text__text">
          UNH was unable to secure a rematch with UMass Lowell from last years championship game; the Wildcats havent won the tournament title since 2003.
         </p>
         <div id="adg_main_bottom">
         </div>
        </div>
        <div id="adg_main_bottom">
        </div>
        <!-- Content Text -->

         </div>
        </div>

         <div class="grid-8">

           </div>
           <div class="headline-list__item">

       <div class="ad-container ad-container--section-ad">
        <div class="ad-container__ad-slot" id="ad_stream6">
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="content-well content-well--sidebar content-well--section">
     <div class="feat-tz-fader">
      <section class="feat-tz-mod" data-transition="slide" id="feat-tz-top">
       <div class="feat-tz-scroller nocontent">
        <script id="ace-ticket-052914-html-template" type="text/javascript">
         (function(){
  //----------DONT-TOUCH-CODE-ABOVE-THIS-LINE---------------------
  //Insert-Promoted-Event-ID-inbetween-the-single-quotes----------
  //Like this : var feature_id = '2938401';-&lt;-Example-&lt;-----------
  var feature_id = '';// &lt;---------&lt;----------&lt;---------------&lt;---
  //----------Here-^----------------------------------------------
  //Insert-the-team-name-to-only-show-games-from-that-team--------
  //Here are the choices:(or-leave-blank)-------------------------
  //--------------celtics-----------------------------------------
  //--------------red sox-----------------------------------------
  //--------------patriots----------------------------------------
  //--------------bruins------------------------------------------
  var team = '';// &lt;---------&lt;----------&lt;---------------&lt;---------
  //----------DONT-TOUCH-CODE-BELOW-THIS-LINE---------------------
  switch(team){
    case "red sox":
        team = "Boston Red Sox";
        break
    case "bruins":
        team = "Boston Bruins"
        break;
    case "centics":
        team = "Boston Centics"
        break;
    case "patriots":
        team ="New England Patriots";
        break;
    default:
        break;
  }
  $.ajax({
      data: {'feature_id': feature_id, 'limit': 1,'team': team},
      dataType: "jsonp",
      jsonp: false,
      jsonpCallback: 'callback',
      url: 'http://www.boston.com/partners/aceticket/bdc-events.jsonp',
      success: function(data) {
        if(data.length){
          $('#ace-ticket-052914-html-template').replaceWith(buildAd(query(data)));
        }else{
          collapseAd();
        }
      },
      error: function(e) {
          collapseAd();
      }
  });
  function query(data){
    var res = data[0];
    $(data).each(function(i,e) {
      if(e.EventID == feature_id){
        res = e;
      }else if(e.team == team){
        res = e;
      }
    });
    return res;
  }
  function collapseAd () {
    // if unable to get data remove ad.
    $('#ace-ticket-052914-html-template').remove();
  }
  function buildAd (event) {
    /*Expected event data format
      {
        "EventID":"1398960",
        "Event":"Boston Red Sox vs Atlanta Braves (Fan Photo Day)",
        "Date":"2014-05-29",
        "Time":"7:10 PM",
        "CategoryID":"8",
        "HeadlinerID":"101186",
        "VenueID":"104270",
        "Venue":"Fenway Park",
        "City":"Boston",
        "State":"MA",
        "Price" : "34"
      }
    */
    var bigLogoUrl = "http://www.boston.com/img/ads/ace-thumb.png";
    var miniLogoUrl = "http://cache.boston.com/partners/acetickets/sf-ace-mini-logo-gry.jpg";
    var aceUrl = "http://tickets.boston.com/";
    var eventUrl = "http://tickets.boston.com/";
    var eventTitle = "Ace Ticket";
    var eventText = "Check out all the upcoming games!";
    if(event["EventID"]){
      eventUrl += "event/" + event["EventID"] + "/";
    }
    if(event["Event"]){
      eventTitle = event["Event"];
    }
    if(event["Date"] &amp;&amp; event["Venue"]){
      eventText = event["Date"] + ', at ' + event["Venue"] + '.';
      if(event["Price"]){
        eventText += ' Best Value! $' + event["Price"] + ' and up.';
      }
    }
    return '&lt;article class="feat-tz sponsor-feat-tz  feat-tz-sponsor-logo" style="text-align:left"&gt;' +
                    '&lt;a target="_blank" class="feat-tz-img-mod art-bd" style="height: auto !important" data-slug="featured-property" href="' + aceUrl + '"&gt;' +
                      '&lt;img class="feat-tz-img" src="' + bigLogoUrl + '"&gt;' + 
                    '&lt;/a&gt; &lt;!-- feat-tz --&gt;' + 
                    '&lt;div class="feat-tz-bd txt-bd"&gt;' +
                      '&lt;h4 class="feat-tz-h tz-title"&gt;&lt;a target="_blank" class="" href="' + eventUrl + '"&gt;' + eventTitle + '&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h4&gt;' +
                      '&lt;p class="tz-txt quick-tz-txt"&gt;' + eventText + '&lt;/p&gt;' +
                      '&lt;article class="tz-sponsor-pair feat-tz-sponsor-pair"&gt;' +
                        '&lt;img class="tz-sponsor-img " src="' + miniLogoUrl + '"&gt;' +
                         '&lt;div class="tz-sponsor-txt-bd feat-tz-sponsor-txt-bd"&gt;' +
                            '&lt;p class="tz-sponsor-message"&gt;Boston.com Tickets powered by&lt;br&gt;&lt;a target="_blank" href="' + aceUrl + '" class="tz-sponsor-name"&gt;Ace Tickets&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/p&gt;' + 
                         '&lt;/div&gt;' +
                      '&lt;/article&gt;' + 
                      '&lt;ul class="tz-meta feat-tz-meta"&gt;' +
                         '&lt;li class="tz-sponsor-icon feat-sponsor-icon"&gt;' + 
                            '&lt;i class="sponsor-hover-info"&gt;Boston.com Tickets powered by Ace Ticket has the best seats for the Red Sox, Celtics, Bruins and Patriots.&lt;/i&gt;' +
                         '&lt;/li&gt;&lt;!-- /.meta-share-list --&gt;' +
                      '&lt;/ul&gt; &lt;!-- /.tz-meta --&gt;' +
                    '&lt;/div&gt; &lt;!-- /feat-tz-bd --&gt;' +
                  '&lt;/article&gt;';

  }
})();
        </script>

         </a>

         <div class="feat-tz-bd txt-bd">
          <h4 class="feat-tz-h tz-title">
           <a class="omnistack" data-omniclick="feature-stack-bundle | headline" href="/sports/baseball/2015/07/10/bastion-baseball-and-noise/ScxRey6jH1rhyOBLEdBBnK/story.html">

           </a>
          </h4>
          <!-- no sister sites -->
          <ul class="tz-meta feat-tz-meta">
           <li class="tz-meta-item tz-category">
            <!-- i'm an empty path -->
            <a class="omnistack" data-omniclick="feature-stack-bundle | section label" href="/sports">

            </a>

          <img alt="Proposed venues for a Boston Olympics" class="feat-tz-img" src="http://p.o0bc.com/rf/image_255x106/Boston/2011-2020/2015/06/10/Boston.com/BCOM/Images/3ba11e019b784b518f1e1cc350bc5005-3ba11e019b784b518f1e1cc350bc5005-0.jpg"/>
          <div class="feat-tz-icon tz-icon tz-gallery-icon">
          </div>
         </a>
         <div class="feat-tz-bd txt-bd">
          <h4 class="feat-tz-h tz-title">
           <a class="omnistack" data-omniclick="feature-stack-bundle | headline" href="/news/local/massachusetts/2015/06/16/bdc-possible-olympic-venue-locations-gallery/U918f6nAC7zZ2MfzAciiJK/pictures.html">
            Proposed venues for a Boston Olympics
           </a>
          </h4>
          <!-- no sister sites -->
          <ul class="tz-meta feat-tz-meta">
           <li class="tz-meta-item tz-category">
            <!-- i'm an empty path -->
            <a class="omnistack" data-omniclick="feature-stack-bundle | section label" href="/news">
             News
            </a>
           </li>
           <li class="tz-meta-item tz-share">
            <!-- editorialLayer = /Boston/Production/BDC/WebPages/homepage.editorial-layer.gallery-asset.dwp -->
            <!-- in share_controller -->
            <a class="tz-share-link js-share-modal" data-ad-name="ad_share" data-canonical="http://www.boston.com/news/local/massachusetts/2015/06/16/bdc-possible-olympic-venue-locations-gallery/U918f6nAC7zZ2MfzAciiJK/pictures.html" data-headline="Proposed venues for a Boston Olympics" data-load-ad="true" data-providers="facebook,twitter,pinterest,googleplus,linkedin,email" data-shorturl="" data-thumb-type="image" data-thumbnail="http://p.o0bc.com/rf/image_255x106/Boston/2011-2020/2015/06/10/Boston.com/BCOM/Images/3ba11e019b784b518f1e1cc350bc5005-3ba11e019b784b518f1e1cc350bc5005-0.jpg" href="#share-modal">

            <!-- editorialLayer = /Boston/Production/BDC/WebPages/sports/sports.editorial-layer.story-asset.dwp -->
            <!-- in share_controller -->
            <a class="tz-share-link js-share-modal" data-ad-name="ad_share" data-canonical="http://www.boston.com/2015/03/22/ryan-westmoreland-off-the-red-sox-but-back-the-game/P9AHnXgVgbbMWTiiOWkeWN/story.html" data-headline="Ryan Westmoreland: Off the Red Sox, But Back in the Game" data-load-ad="true" data-providers="facebook,twitter,pinterest,googleplus,linkedin,email" data-shorturl="" data-thumb-type="image" data-thumbnail="http://p.o0bc.com/rf/image_255x106/Boston/2011-2020/2014/06/19/Boston.com/Sports/Images/e1001ebe5c7c47acb2cd674ca8ccbefe-e1001ebe5c7c47acb2cd674ca8ccbefe-0-14216.jpg" href="#share-modal">

         </div>
         <!-- /feat-tz-bd -->
        </article>
       </div>

      </section>

     </li>

      <a class="share-modal__icon-list__link js-gigya-share" data-canonical="http://www.boston.com/sports/colleges/2015/03/20/hockey-east-semifinals-can-umass-lowell-get-third-straight-title-game/FcWBvtPnxo9b1A6lTadSZP/story.html" data-cid="article_page_modal_linkedin" data-headline="Hockey East Championship: Can UMass Lowell Capture Third Straight Title?" data-provider="linkedin" data-thumb-type="image" data-thumbnail="http://p.o0bc.com/rf/image_700w/Boston/2011-2020/2014/03/26/Boston.com/Sports/Images/1dfe86b7dfec4dbea19991fa8429c038-1dfe86b7dfec4dbea19991fa8429c038-0.jpg" href="#">
       <span class="share-modal__icon-list__icon bdc-icon bdc-icon--linkedin-x-large">
        Linked In
       </span>
      </a>
     </li>
     <li class="share-modal__icon-list__item">
      <a class="share-modal__icon-list__link js-email-share" data-omniture="Email | Share Modal | Article Page" data-provider="email" href="#">

        Email
       </span>
      </a>
     </li>
    </ul>
   </div>
   <!--/ icon-list -->

   (function() {
        if ($('#streams-row').length) {
